ygData.subject: Re: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I use the Pumice stones all the time on Tarew Marr. It IS 5 charges of Nullify Magic. It removes 2 enchantments at a time. As far  loosing buffs. You
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I use the Pumice stones all the time on Tarew Marr. It IS 5 charges of
Nullify Magic. It removes 2 enchantments at a time. As far loosing buffs.
You loose buffs then you Die to. Oh and exp.

Yes the Gate potion dropped by the cenobites is to the cazic maze
teleporter. Although for me I WOULD rather die in the maze that i know
REALLY well than way down in lower guk where corpse recovery takes a LONG
time some times. I could gate to the teleporter in cazic with 2 bubbls of
life and make out of their alive. My point was there ARE times when I would
use the potions. Evacers are oom clerics oom, evacers are getting hit hard
im dropping fast EVERYONE is going to die.. I refuse to pay 1000 plat for a
gate potion in the stores..


Tuldar 34th Bard
Nuldar 41st Necromancer

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 2:57 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Hmm a screen shot i looked at beofre posting showed it as PE not CM but i
>thot i remembered it as CM - maybe they changed it <sigh> And yes 5
charges
>- not sure how many icons it strips each time - hehe and it strips from top
>down so if you were heavily buffed...<click> goodbye symbols, goodbye
valor,
>goodbye spirit armor, <click> goodbye sow... etc etc until goodbye root.
>
>Does the cazic gate potion gate you to your bind spot or to the wizard gate
>in CT? I dont know if i'd wanna come out of Lguk hurtin' and be dropped
>into the CT maze - when you are real low HP even the green trash that is
>normally non-agro will be on you. For evac, you really wanna have a druid
>or wiz.
>
>Also, you can buy a gate potion for a measly 1000pp or so. I actually saw
>some one use it (a heavily twinked young warrior to boot!).
>
>Sylly Songsynger
>Bard of the 35th Song
><Spirit of the Moon>
>somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Bobby [mailto:merlin26@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 12:23 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
>
>
>From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>
>
>Quick note,
>
>
>Egg Shaped Pumice stone: 15-18 plat
>Contains 5 charges of "NULLIFY Magic" as I use these alot and my
necromancer
>has the spell Nullify removes TWO enchantments at a time.
>
>
>The Golem Wand from cazic Thule-5 charges of "Pillage Enchantment" as I am
>holding mine in reserve for when I run out of pumice stones deep in lower
>guk I have not used it yet.
>
>
>Also another priceless object to be gotten bu bards..
>
>The Cazic Thule Gate Potion. Dopped by the Cenobite in the avatar of fear
>room. Its suposedly the "common" drop off the cenobite the rare drop being
>the rogue only raven scale boots. Although the cenibite to me the other
>night RARELY EVER spawned. Just a darn justicar in his place.
>
>I plan on having me a few gate potions on hand when I decide to live in
>lower guk for a while.
>
>
>Tuldar 34th bard Tarew Marr
>(41st necro as msecondary character)
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
